title: NASDAQ Offer Evaluation
content:
Education: B.Tech (CSE)
Years of Experience: ~8 years
Prior Experience: Product based company (Senior Software Engineer)
Current CTC : 24 LPA (including 10% variable)
Date of the Offer: Feb 2024
Company: **NASDAQ**
Title/Level: Software Developer Specialist - Java Backend
Location: Bangalore
Fixed Salary : INR 37,00,000
Variable Pay : INR   3,70,000 (i.e. 10% of the fixed component)
RSU : INR   1,50,000 (i.e. 4% of the CTC) [*will be given 33% every year for 3 years*]
Relocation/Signing Bonus:0
Bonus:0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 37,00,000 + 3,70,000 + 50,000 : INR 41,20, 000
Mode : Hybrid (2 days work from office / 3 days WFH)

**Would be great if someone from NASDAQ can help with the salary range or if I am lowballed here?**

**First offer evaluation :** https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/4758109/Saviynt-Offer-Letter-or-OpenText-Selected

title: Zscaler | Developer Internship+FTE | 2024 batch
content:
**Education**: B.Tech from Tier-2 College 
**YOE**: 0 years (Fresher)
**Company**: ZScaler
**Title**: Developer
**Level**: Internship+FTE
**Stipend during Internship**: 50k INR per month
**Internship Duration**: 6 months
**Base Salary**: INR 14,00,000
**Bonus**: INR 2,00,000
**Stock bonus**: 15K USD RSU's
**Total**: ~ INR 26,00,000

Selection process (Fully Online)
*Pre-Placement Talk-> Hacker Rank Test-> 2 Technical Interview Rounds*

title: Beware of Arista Networks
content:
Education: Tier I CS
Years of Experience: 2+
Prior Experience: Product MNC with previous 26.5 L
Date of the Offer: January 2024
Company: Arista Networks
Title/Level: SDE2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 22LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 4.5L
Bonus: 3L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 29.5L


When they started the interview I clarified that my expectations were Base 30LPA and Overall 40+. The Recruiter agreed to the number and proceeded with interviews.
After I cleared the interview , in offer discussion call, they came up with a 29.5lpa CTC , a scant 15% Hike. And also they won't consider me for appraisal until an year. 
I asked why they wasted my time conducting an interview at all and rejected the offer.
